name: unaccountable
content:
unaccountable adjective
(NOT RESPONSIBLE)
be unaccountable to someone/something
Add to word list
Add to word list
to not be expected to explain or provide a reason to a particular person or organization for your actions: The military and CIA hire contractors who are completely unaccountable to Congress.
See more
unaccountable adjective
(SURPRISING)
not able to be explained or understood: unaccountable reason For some unaccountable reason, he keeps his wallet in his underwear drawer.

Related word
unaccountably
Add to word list
Add to word list
not able to be explained or understood: For some unaccountable reason, he forgot his car keys.
Someone who is unaccountable does not have to explain his or her actions to anyone in authority.
